rule.title: Waterfall
rule.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

red.title: Waterfall
red.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Minimum of 5 seconds

rule.title: Council of Drinks
rule.description:
Everyone nominate someone to drink.
I love democracy

red.title: Drinks Miser
red.description: Take 2 drinks for being such a hoarder

black.title: Charity Time
black.description:
Give out 2 drinks to people.
Charity is nice, isn't it?

rule.title: Nursery
rule.description:
Everyone below your age, drinks.
If you're the youngest, you take a drink.

red.title: Drinks Miser
red.description: Take 3 drinks for being such a hoarder

black.title: Charity Ball
black.description:
Give out 3 drinks to people.
Charity is nice, isn't it?

rule.title: Loose Women!
rule.description:
Drink up ladies.
Dust off that wine glass.

Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

Mercy? Never.

rule.title: Heavens Gateway
rule.description:
Shoot your hand straight up.
Reach for the gates.

red.title: Waterfall

Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

black.title: Waterfall
black.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

rule.title: Date
rule.description:
Pick someone to drink with you forever.
It gets lonely, doesn't it?

red.title: Waterfall
red.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

black.title: Waterfall
black.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

rule.title: Wildcard
rule.description:
Pick a random card to play.
Mercy? Never.

red.title: Little Secret
red.description:
Go around and say a secret.
Hesitation is weakness!

black.title: Wildcard
black.description:
Pick a random card to play.
Mercy? Never.

rule.title: Categories
rule.description:
Pick a category to riff off.
Hesitate, you drink.

red.title: Waterfall
red.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

black.title: Waterfall
black.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

rule.title: Thumb Master
rule.description:
Put your thumb up to drink!
Last to put it up drinks!

red.title: Waterfall
red.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

black.title: Waterfall
black.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

rule.title: Question Master
rule.description:
Ask people questions until you are dethroned
Failure to answer is a drink.

red.title: Question Master
red.description:
Go around the group and ask a question.
Failure to answer is a drink.
If everyone answers, you drink 3 times.

black.title: Never Have I Ever
black.description: Anyone that has done it, drink up!

rule.title: Rule Master
rule.description:
Make a new rule for the group.
Anyone that breaks it drinks.

red.title: Waterfall
red.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

black.title: Waterfall
black.description:
Everyone drinks till you stop!
Mercy? Never.

0.title: Tap your head
0.description: Before every drink, you must tap your head. Failure to do so, adds another drink to the tally

1.title: ATTENTION!
1.description: Stand at attention when you take your drink. Nobody should be sitting for Popcorn Sutton.

2.title: Hummingbirds
2.description: During a waterfall, hum a tune as you drink. Let that voice box fight the booze.

3.title: Mexican Wave
3.description: At a social drink, everyone must be in time for a mexican wave. Failure is a tally mark to drink

4.title: Mr Worldwide
4.description: Everyone must talk in an accent. Anyone that screws it up, drinks.

5.title: Marriage
5.description: You and your dates have gotten married. If they drink, so do you.

6.title: Parrot
6.description: Before you start your sentence, say the last word said before.

7.title: DOUBLE
7.description: Drink twice as much as you are supposed to. Dates apply.

8.title: 2 Shots of Vodka
8.description: After a waterfall, nominate someone to take a 5 second chug

9.title: Trust Excercise
9.description: Make a buzzword. Anyone can say it, but everyone has to drink once it's said.

10.title: Christian Server
10.description: No swearing on this christian server.

11.title: Even Numbers
11.description: Every even number is double the drinks
